text: John Dickin (10 February 1899 - 1966) was a British swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre freestyle event at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1966 deaths Category:British male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Great Britain Category:Swimmers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing Category:Male freestyle swimmers
title: John Dickin
